Name: Gold Mask of General Undjebauendjed
Description: This mask is an idealized portrait of General Un-djedbau-en-djed as a young man with a peaceful expression lightened by a gentle smile. The mask covered the face, neck, and ears. It ended at the forehead where six small-perforated tongues allowed it to be fixed to the head of the mummy. The inlaid eyes are made of glass paste in different colors. The nose is perfect in form, and the lips are narrow and fleshy. The ears are not symmetrical as the left one protrudes further than the right.
